text: Justice Mandagadde Rama Jois (27 July 1931 - 16 February 2021) was an Indian politician, activist and writer. He was a member of Rajya Sabha for the Bharatiya Janata Party. He was the governor of the Jharkhand and Bihar states. He was Chief Justice of the Punjab and Haryana High Court in 1992. He was born in Araga, Shivamogga District. Jois died of cardiac arrest on 16 February 2021 in Bangalore, India at the age of 89.Ex-J'khand & Bihar Guv Rama Jois passes away ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Governors of Bihar Category:Governors of Jharkhand Category:20th- century Indian writers Category:Members of the Rajya Sabha
title: Rama Jois
